56.eng-name: Fighting for the Cause of Allah (Jihaad)

hadiths.text: Narrated `Aisha:Once the Jews came to the Prophet (ﷺ) and said, "Death be upon you." So I cursed them. The Prophet (ﷺ) said, "What is the matter?" I said, "Have you not heard what they said?" The Prophet (ﷺ) said, "Have you not heard what I replied (to them)? (I said), ('The same is upon you)

chapter.ara-name: باب الدُّعَاءِ عَلَى الْمُشْرِكِينَ بِالْهَزِيمَةِ وَالزَّلْزَلَةِ
chapter.eng-name: To invoke Allah to defeat and shake Al-Mushrikun
